name: SpharmReco
author: AFNI Developers
description: Spherical Harmonics Reconstruction from a set of harmonics and their corresponding coefficients.

inputs.description: Surface that provides the topology of the mesh (nodes' connections). TYPE specifies the input surface type.
inputs.name: Input Surface

inputs.description: Prefix of files containing the bases functions (spherical harmonics). These files are generated with SpharmDeco.
inputs.name: Bases Prefix

inputs.description: Coefficients files used to recompose data columns. Multiple coefficient files can be specified by repeating the option.
inputs.name: Coefficient Files

inputs.description: Write out the reconstructed data into dataset PREFIX. The output contains N columns; one for each COEF file.
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Write out a new surface with reconstructed coordinates. Requires N to be a multiple of 3.
inputs.name: Output Surface

inputs.description: Smoothing parameter (0 .. 0.001) weighing the contribution of higher order harmonics
inputs.name: Smoothing Parameter
